item.title: SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablet with Fluoride – Camping Travel Hiking Backpacking – Vegan Natural Ingredient – White Teeth, Fresh Breath (Peppermint) (60 Count (Pack of 1))

item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.98
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:37:49 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Freshen Your Breath Wherever You Go

Bringing tubes of toothpaste when you travel can be a hassle. Needing to put them into clear zipper bags for airport security? Or how about those tubes being squished and exploding all over your luggage.

Either way, a day spent being hassled by screening officers or washing off exploded dried toothpaste from your clothes is surely not how you intend to travel. With SIMPLUT’s toothpaste tablets, you can travel freely and have fresh breath and clean teeth no matter where you are in the world.

Exceptional Dental Care Without Harsh Chemicals

We think of toothpaste as great for the teeth. And they are—aside from the many out there that contain chemicals harmful to our health and well-being in the long run.

Our toothpaste tablets taste good and are naturally flavored with Xylitol, sage, and green tea extracts. Paraben-free, these tabs also contain Vitamins B6, E, C, and fluoride for better dental health.

Sustainable Oral Care Solution

Making the switch to zero-waste living or just wanting to try out a product that’ll redefine the way you use toothpaste? 100% plastic-free, SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets come in a tin case that lets you get the most out of portable toothpaste. Take one tablet, chew, and brush. No more squeezing that last bit of toothpaste from a tube.

keep your teeth healthy With Chewable Toothpaste

Keep your teeth healthy and away from plaque and cavities while keeping your breath fresh. SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets contain fluoride to strengthen tooth enamel. Other toothpaste tablets don’t contain fluoride, which means that your teeth aren’t getting the protection they need to stay healthy.

Suitable for Vegans Too

SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets are made only with plant-based ingredients. These peppermint-flavored tablets do not contain any raw animal substances and are never tested on animals. Gluten-free, SIMPLUT toothpaste is also recognized by “Wasteless Design”, a certification given to products that reduce your carbon footprint through plastic-free packaging.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.95 x 2.87 x 1.18 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ sl001
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ SIMPLUT
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07RLNKLP8

EASY TO USE: The mouthwash tablets are incredibly easy to use. Take a tablet or two, chew it a few times, and brush away! The micro particles will clean your teeth, and whiten your teeth.
MINIMAL CHEMICAL USE: Our flavored toothpaste tablets contain Vitamins B6, E, C, Xylitol, aloe extract and fluoride, without any parabens or sulphates. These tablets provide best possible dental care while using the least amount of chemicals possible.

Read more
